plot: Natasha tries to get rid of some heavy burden. But a succession of bad luck and evil meetings turns her day into a descent into hell that might be fatal to her.
title: Bambino
plot_es: Natasha tries to get rid of some heavy burden. But a succession of bad luck and evil meetings turns her day into a descent into hell that might be fatal to her.
plot_en: Natasha tries to get rid of some heavy burden. But a succession of bad luck and evil meetings turns her day into a descent into hell that might be fatal to her.
